original_text: While his father Terah was still alive, Haran died in Ur of the Chaldeans, in the land of his birth.
korean_text: 하란은 그 아비 데라보다 먼저 고향 갈대아인의 우르에서 죽었더라

sentences.original_text: While his father Terah was still alive
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 아버데 데라가 아직 살아 있을 때

sentences.original_text: Haran died in Ur of the Chaldeans
in the land of his birth
